mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.parent_id AS parentId, a.parent_ids AS parentIds, a.name AS name, a.full_name AS fullName, a.sort AS sort, a.code AS code, a.type AS type, a.address AS address, a.zip_code AS zipCode, a.phone AS phone, a.email AS email, a.primary_person AS primaryPerson, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate, a.update_by AS updateBy, a.update_date AS updateDate, a.remarks AS remarks, a.del_flag AS delFlag
